author: TV Guide
title: We Finally Know When Sherlock's Victorian Special Will Air
text: We Finally Know When Sherlock's Victorian Special Will Air Sherlock is back!A new 90-minute Sherlock special will premiere on Masterpiece! Mystery on New Year's Day, PBS announced on Saturday.Sherlock: The Abominable... Comment Posted Oct. 25, 2015 at 12:08 PM Updated at 3:28 PM Posted Oct. 25, 2015 at 12:08 PM Updated at 3:28 PM Sherlock is back! A new 90-minute Sherlock special will premiere on Masterpiece! Mystery on New Year's Day, PBS announced on Saturday. Sherlock: The Abominable Bride will mark the first time the series will debut a new installment in the U.S. and U.K. on the same day. (Please let this trend continue for Season 4!) The special will air on PBS on Friday, Jan. 1 at 9/8c and simultaneously will premiere online. The special will bring Sherlock ( Benedict Cumberbatch ) and Dr. Watson ( Martin Freeman ) back in time , to 1890s London, to investigate a new case. Amanda Abbington , Rupert Graves and Una Stubbs will also star. The special can tide over Sherlock fans until Season 4, which is set to begin production next spring. Watch a sneak peek from the special here: Other Links From TVGuide.com
